org.jboss.modcluster.advertise

Interface AdvertiseListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvertiseListenerImpl

    public interface AdvertiseListener
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Deallocate listener and close sockets.
      void pause()
      Pause the listener, which will make it stop accepting new advertise messages.
      void resume()
      Resume the listener, which will make it start accepting new advertise messages again.
      void start()
      Start the Listener, creating listener thread.
      void stop()
      Stop the endpoint.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
           throws IOException
        Start the Listener, creating listener thread.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause the listener, which will make it stop accepting new advertise messages.

      • resume

        void resume()
        Resume the listener, which will make it start accepting new advertise messages again.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the endpoint. This will cause all processing threads to stop.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Deallocate listener and close sockets.
